item.title: Stephen Szára
item.description: Stephen Szára Hungarian-born chemist and psychiatrist best known for his pioneering discovery of DMT’s psychoactivity.

item.title: Drugism (Vincent Rado Substack)
item.description: Drugism is Vincent Rado’s Substack and book project discussing how society assigns moral, political, and cultural meaning to drug use.
